### CCGS Jean Goodwill Dry-Docking Tender Announcement

**Procurement Reference**: PW_HAL_311_11616  
**Solicitation Number**: F5561-221029/A  
**Tender Closing Date**: April 4, 2023, 13:00:00 CST
**Tender Status**: Expired

**Background**: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires the dry-docking refit of the CCGS Jean Goodwill, as detailed in the attached Statement of Work.

**Trade Agreements**: This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Trade agreement exemptions are noted in the tender package.

**Sourcing Strategy**: The sourcing strategy for this procurement is limited to suppliers in Eastern Canada, in accordance with the Shipbuilding, Repair, Refit, and Modernization Policy.

**Work Period**: The work period is from May 1, 2023, to July 10, 2023. The vessel will be unmanned during the work period and will be considered out of commission.

**Bidder's Conference and Site Visit**: A bidders' conference will be held onboard the vessel on February 22, 2023. Bidders are required to confirm their attendance by submitting written intent to the contracting authority. A site visit will also be conducted on February 21 and 22, 2023.

**Bid Submission**: Tenderers are required to submit their bids electronically using the Canada Post Corporation's Connect application. Hard copy bids will not be accepted.

**Notice**: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contracting Authority**:

* Name: Dave Dunne
* Contact Information:
	+ Email: [dave.dunne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dave.dunne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (902) 401-4294
* Address: 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, NS, B3J 1T3

**Attachments**: Tender documents and addenda can be accessed on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website.
